Package movieassignment

Class CineplexList

java.lang.Object
movieassignment.CineplexList
public class CineplexList extends Object
This class creates CineplexList which is an arraylist of cineplexes and contains the methods to process and use it.
Author:
Lin Da wei, Jarel Tan Zhi Wen, Lui Shi Ying, Solomon Duke Tneo Yruan Rui, Wong Yi Xian
